name: PDF Blocks Server
description: Self-hosted PDF server to merge, password-protect, watermark PDF documents, and more. https://www.pdfblocks.com.

LICENSE_KEY.description: Your PDF Blocks license key. To try PDF Blocks without a license, set this field to "evaluation". To get a license key go to https://www.pdfblocks.com/licensing.

API_KEY_HASH.description: An optional SHA-256 hash of a string to use as an API key. If set, API requests must have an X-Api-Key header with the string as the value.
